DOC.detailed_description: This pilot trial explore cardiovascular eight week twice weekly high intensity interval training people progressive multiple sclerosis . A control group people progressive multiple sclerosis undergo continuous moderate intensity exercise , twice weekly 8 week . The training program entail 6x1.5 minute interval work 80-95 % heart rate max cycle ergometer . Each interval intersperse 1.5 minute work rest light resistance participant 's choosing . The continuous moderate intensity exercise program entail 20 minute cycle ergometer work 60-70 % heart rate max .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed progressive form MS Aged 18 year old Known member staff MS service NHS Ayrshire & Arran Ability attend Douglas Grant Rehabilitation centre twice week eight week EDSS 46.0 Able cycle ergometer A relapse symptom require treatment within past three month . A respiratory condition would exacerbate high intensity exercise include limited : chronic obstructive pulmonary disorder , uncontrolled poorly control asthma . Uncontrolled high pressure screening ( > 190/100 mmHg ) Cognitive impairment affect ability understand instruction note patient 's note .
